title: Walton 40090 9 Piece 8" Long Style B Tap Extension Set (#0-#6, #8, #10, #12, 1/4", 5/16", 3/8", 7/16" 1/2")
features: Each set of nine Style B Tap Extensions fits 15 tap sizes and includes three hex keys and six extra socket set screws.
Each set of nine Style B Tap Extensions is packed in a sturdy plastic case
Construction to close tolerances and carefully heat treated alloy steel for strength and durability
The tap, supported by the close-fitting deep socket of the extension, is held firmly in position by two socket set screws bearing 90Â° apart on the square of the tap
description: Remove broken taps and save the threads! Walton Tap Extractors let you remove broken taps without drilling, lasers, damaged threads, scrapped parts or repair inserts. The hardened steel fingers of Walton Tap Extractors fit in the flutes of a broken tap to back it out simply and safely. This effective method has been used since 1908. They are available in every tap size, both inch and metric, as handy sets or individual pieces. Our Tap Extractors will fit both NC and NF taps. Since 1908, the Walton Company has been the leading manufacturer of tap removal tools in the world. During the past 100 years we have added to our original line of Walton Tap Extractors, the "REPS" line of Pipe, Stud & Screw Extractors and our Tap Extensions for both machine and hand tapping.
